description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9mi1g","text":"Here we provide a protocol for Cas9-targeted Nanopore sequencing. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ej66","text":"We successfully applied this method for targeted sequencing and DNA methylation profiling of genes in cereal genomes, as well as for insertions of transposable elements (inherited and somatic) in Arabidopsis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":102,"length":14},{"key":1,"offset":196,"length":11}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"410AE73019E24E3ABC53ABC1D5BF2E64","url":"https://doi.org/10.3390%2Fplants11010005"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"75CEAE728F6E4421ACFF533C95C5FACE","url":"https://doi.org/10.1111/jipb.13555"}}}}
